<title level="1" pfs="">[Takatorra (Level 13)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1485)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 41

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 13">[Takatorra (Level 13)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1485)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 27</row>

**Perception** +25; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Nagaji](/Languages.aspx?ID=87), [Tengu](/Languages.aspx?ID=47), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +21, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +19, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +2

**Con** +5

**Int** +1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [hide armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)_, _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [tengu gale blades](/Languages.aspx?ID=47)_ (2), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [frost](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296) [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74)_ (20 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 32 

**Fort** +26 

**Ref** +23 

**Will** +25 

</row>

**HP** 300

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> If Takatorra's Attack of Opportunity is a critical success, they can choose to automatically [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) the targeted creature in addition to dealing damage.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_tengu gale blade_ +26 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Tengu](/Traits.aspx?ID=240)),
**Damage** 3d6+13 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
beak +24 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d6+13 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_composite longbow_ +22 ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 2d8+8 piercing plus 1d6 cold

**Blade Barrage** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Takatorra unleashes a flurry of attacks. Takatorra makes five melee Strikes. Their multiple attack penalty applies as normal. They gain a cumulative +2 circumstance bonus to damage for each successful Strike. If one target is hit with at least two of these Strikes, they also take 2d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). They then become [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the start of their next turn.

**Disarming Whirl** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Flourish](/Traits.aspx?ID=73)) Takatorra spins, striking at their foes' weapons. Takatorra attempts an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) against each enemy within melee reach. Each attempt counts toward Takatorra's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty does not increase until they have made all the attempts.

**Soaring Flight** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Morph](/Traits.aspx?ID=113), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Tengu](/Traits.aspx?ID=240), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** Takatorra expands their wings, gaining a 25-foot fly Speed for 5 minutes.

</column>
name: Takatorra (Level 13)
